org.openimaj.image.feature.global

Class AvgBrightness

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.mask.AbstractMaskedObject<FImage>
      • org.openimaj.image.feature.global.AvgBrightness
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>, ImageAnalyser<MBFImage>, MaskedObject<FImage>

    public class AvgBrightness
extends AbstractMaskedObject<FImage>
implements ImageAnalyser<MBFImage>, FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>
    Extract the average brightness of an image. Brightness can be computed in a number of different ways, depending on the chosen AvgBrightness.Mode.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary
